q: In SAP, Alice is working on a Subsidiary Ledger account named Accounts Payable to record and manage accounting data for all the vendors. If she is required to work on the steps for the configuration of this account, then determine the first step that she needs to perform in this scenario?

a.option: Create number range for vendors account

q:
In SAP, Anita is working on Financial Accounting Global settings configuration. If she is required to define the document types after defining the posting keys, then which of the following sequences of steps must she follow to perform this action in this scenario:

Steps

  1. Financial Accounting
  2. Financial Accounting Global settings
  3. Documents
  4. Define Document types
  5. Documents header
  6. SPRO
  7. IMG

In SAP, Mike is working on Financial Accounting Global settings configuration. Initially, he has defined a Fiscal year. If he is required to assign Company Code to Fiscal Year Variant, then determine its transaction code?

In SAP, Tara is working on Financial Accounting Global settings configuration. Initially, she has defined a Fiscal year and assigned the Company Code to the Fiscal Year Variant. Now, she has defined the variant for both the open and close posting period. Which of the following actions must she perform in this scenario before she defines the Field status variant?

a.option: Assign Company code to Field Status Variants

q:
John is working on Enterprise Structure Settings and configuration from SAP Financial Accounting. If he is required to define Functional Area in SAP, then which of the following statements about this Functional Area are correct:

Statements

  1. This area is used to create a P&L A/C in Financial Accounting by using the cost of sales accounting.
  2. John can classify the expenses by implementing these functional areas.
  3. These functional areas can be created in SAP using T-code OKBD only.

Ben is working on Enterprise Structure Settings and configuration from SAP Financial  Accounting. He has defined the Functional area. Now, if he is required to define Credit Control Area, then determine the transaction code for this Credit Control Area in this scenario?

Alice is working on Enterprise Structure Settings and configuration from SAP Financial Accounting. Now, if she is assigning the company code to company in this scenario, then determine its transaction code?
What will be the result if 'svga.vgaOnly=TRUE' is added in a VMX file?

a.option: Reduce the memory overhead of VM
Remove the settings that allow BIOS to enter VGA mode.

q: Which of the following cases is qualified for VMware FT?

a.option: Virtual machines configured with periodic snapshot backups
Virtual machines configured as linked clones
Virtual machines with DRS host affinity rules

q: In SAP, Asset accounting is a sub-ledger to the SAP FI module for managing the Asset records. If you are working on the configuration of this module, then determine the transaction code for assigning Chart of Depreciation to Company Code in this scenario?

Bob is working on SAP FICO Accounts. If she is required to work on the steps for this account receivable configuration, then which of the following sequences of steps to perform this action in this scenario are correct:

Steps

  1. Creation of GL Reconciliation Accounts, creation of Customer master records, and document types and Number range ( DR, DZ, DA )
  2. Creation of Customer Account Group, create Number Ranges for Customer Accounts and assign Number range to Customer Accounts groups.
  3. Define tolerance group for the Customer.
  4. Bill of Exchange and Dunning

In SAP, Paul is working on General Ledger Accounting which is the complete record of all business transactions. He is working on the configuration steps for this Accounting. If he is required to define the Chart of Accounts, then determine its transaction code?

Bob is working on Enterprise Structure Settings and configuration from SAP Financial  Accounting. Now, if he is required to define a company in this procedure, then which of the following sequences of steps should he follow in this scenario:

  1. Implementation Guide for R/3 Customizing (IMG)
  2. Definition
  3. Define Company
  4. SPRO
  5. Enterprise Structure
  6. Financial Accounting

The SAP Financial Accounting enterprise structure is an organizational structure that represents an enterprise structure in SAP. Which of the following sequences of steps for Enterprise Structure Settings and configuration are correct:

  1. Define Business Area
  2. Define Credit Control Area
  3. Define Functional Area
  4. Define Company
  5. Define Company Code
  6. Assign Company Code to Company
  7. Assign Company Code to Credit Control Area

John is working on an in-memory database named H2 database for his Spring Boot application. Now, he has configured the H2 database to utilize in his application by adding the following dependency to the pom.xml file. Now, assume that he has configured the data source URL, driver class name, username, and password of the H2 database. He is required to persist the data in the H2 database. Alice has asked him to store the data in a file named hackmyh2db to perform this action. In order to store the data in that file, which of the following actions John must perform in this scenario:

Dependency in pom.xml file

<dependency>  
<groupId>com.h2database</groupId>  
<artifactId>h2</artifactId>  
<scope>runtime</scope>  
</dependency>

a.option: Change the driver class name property
Change the destination on configuration file
Change the username and the password properties

q: In your daily health check reports you find an ESXi host as Not Responding in vCenter Server, what could be a probable cause?

a.option: VMs on the ESXi host are not responding
ESXi host is unable to communicate with vCenter Server
vCenter Server service is not responding
ESxi host is in maintenance mode.

q: A client has requested to increase disk size of a Vm from 100GB to 500GB, also he has requested keep a backup plan to restore VM to its original 100GB state. Should there be any disk corruption or unexpected issues after the disk expansion. Select the best way to achieve the requirement.

a.option: Take snapshot of VM & increase VMDK size from 100GB to 500GB
Create Clone of VM & increase VMDK size from 100GB to 500GB of original VM
No backout plan as the VM cannot be restored after disk is expanded.
Create a new 500Gb VMDK after removing the old 100GB disk.

q:
In Kafka, which of the following represent the two essential configurations of the consumer API:

  1. group.id
  2. segment.ms
  3. zookeeper.connect
  4. retention.bytes
You have recently made some changes to the VMX file of a virtual machine named 'PRODSERVER' but the changes are not visible in the virtual machine 'Edit Settings'. How would you reload that VMX file?

In Kafka, which of the following statements about the zookeeper.connect configuration are correct:

  1. It allows you to add a chroot path that makes all the Kafka data for this cluster appear under all the paths.
  2. It allows you to set up multiple Kafka clusters or other applications on the different ZooKeeper cluster at an instance of time. 
  3. It specifies the ZooKeeper connection string in the port:hostname where hostname and port are the host and port for a node in the ZooKeeper clusterIn Kafka.
